org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.task

Class IndexTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.task.Task
      • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.task.IndexTask
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RebuildIndexTask

    public abstract class IndexTask
extends Task
    Abstract task used to factorize some code shared by different tasks involving indexes.
